message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a product that aligns perfectly with your needs and holds significant value. I understand this product is worth $1000000 to you, and I'm confident it will be a game-changer. I'm offering it to you for $1050000. This price reflects its exceptional value and the potential benefits it will bring to your endeavors.  Please let me know your decision. If you decline, I'll be moving forward with another buyer who has already expressed strong interest.
